attributes.review: I obviously downloaded this app because I loved bunker boy with every fiber of my being 💔 then I became educated 😡🤬now I realize that Donnie is a racist homophobic excuse of a president. Anyone but trump 2020 🥰😍

attributes.review: upon opening the app they show you a full screen picture of trump. 😩 if that isn’t a scary welcoming to you i don’t know what is. 10/10 worst app i’ve ever downloaded. don’t get, would give a 0 if i could.
